titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: COST OR INCOME VALUE (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) - Description

div.p: COST OR INCOME VALUE (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the same as attribute FINANCIAL AMOUNT for the purpose of reporting Patient Level Information Costing.
COST OR INCOME VALUE (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the financial transaction value related to the cost and income for Patient Level Information Costing.
